Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2012-11-21)
------------------

* Plone 4 compatibility [micecchi]

0.2.0 (2010-12-03)
------------------

* take care of the option set in "*Show content type icons*" [keul]
* portlet is not more show empty, when there are not contents to display [keul]
* added some tests [keul]

0.1.0 (2010-11-25)
------------------

* initial release
